name: Robin C
review: I had the team out today to clean 2 mattresses and a 3 piece sofa set. They arrived on time, were very thorough and professional. 10/10 recommend and will definitely use again!

name: Terry Ruebush
review: Another excellent job by Sudu Araliya Cleaning Service in the Galle area. My sectional sofa cushions were in need of a good professional cleaning and I immediately thought of Sudu! They arrive at the agreed time, worked quickly but thoroughly.

name: Akila Siriwardana
review: Highly recommend this service üëç Very professional and Experienced staff get the Job done beautifully üíê

name: symon meikle
review: Damith's team delivered exceptional cleaning services at our recently acquired property by Koggala Lake. They arrived on time, despite the short notice, and dedicated a full day to meticulously transform the space.

name: Paulus
review: Excellent service. They do the windows of my hotel every 2, or 3 months. Also have they done some deep cleaning of furniture. Great job. Good communication!

name: aahid alam
review: HIGHLY RECOMMENDING !!! , So professional team, Great service , Neat and punctual , probably the best in the downsouth SriLanka !

name: Sarah Andrews
review: I had my sofa cleaned and they did a fantastic job. They were efficient, communication was easy and they left the place really clean afterwards. I will be using them again for other cleaning jobs that I have. Fully recommend them
